question: Analyze the social media presence and engagement metrics of top companies in the technology sector for the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify the top companies in the technology sector based on revenue and market capitalization.
Retrieve the engagement metrics of the identified companies from their social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter).
Aggregate and analyze the engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) to derive insights about their social media performance over the last year.
Create a report summarizing the findings on social media presence and engagement trends for the top companies.
